titleStmt.title: The island princess, or, The generous Portugal a comedy, as it is acted at the Theatre Royal by His Majesties servants.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A39805 of text R24337 in the English Short Title Catalog (Wing F1345). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

fileDesc.extent: Approx. 168 KB of XML-encoded text transcribed from 41 1-bit group-IV TIFF page images.

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Evanston,IL, Notre Dame, IN, St. Louis, MO

availability.p: This keyboarded and encoded edition of the work described above is co-owned by the institutions providing financial support to the Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership. This Phase I text is available for reuse, according to the terms of Creative Commons 0 1.0 Universal . The text can be copied, modified, distributed and performed, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from: (Early English Books Online ; image set 40929)
Images scanned from microfilm: (Early English books, 1641-1700 ; 1229:19)

notesStmt.note: "By Fletcher only"-Fleay, Biog. chron. Eng. drama. Cf. also Camb. hist. Eng. lit., v. 6, p. 157.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
